duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate mowers and string trimmers for trimming greens, aprons, tees, and around trees, fence lines, banks, and hillsides.
Maintain ball washers, replace tee towels and flags when needed, remove debris, sand and seed tee, and drop area divots, and clean flower beds.
Clean machinery after each use and maintenance area as required. Water and fertilize the course as required.
Spray chemicals on landscaped areas under supervision of a certified applicator. Assist in project work including construction of new greens, tees, and fairways.
Maintain logs for the operation, maintenance, and gas usage of each machine.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (GED). Prior trade school education is preferred.
